entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Shell tests on CI for iOS #8568
    6.0-servicing
  • [Proposal] Show progress of issue on GitHub #8566
  • Non removable forced padding on each ListViewItem #8564
    6.0.300
  • Border shadow leaks memory and eventually crashes the app (Android) #8563
  • Entry.IsSpellCheckEnabled="False" still shows squiggly line #8558
  • CustomView causes a memory leak #8557
  • Flow direction is LeftToRight on iOS rtl language #8556
  • Essentials should work in Windows Packaged (MSIX) apps #8553
    6.0-sr3
  • Essentials should work in Windows Unpackaged apps #8552
    6.0-sr3
  • Debugging and error logging on VS Mac and Blazor MAUI #8551
  • [Android] Picker got triggered when pressing other button in CollectionView entry #8546

Closed

  • Adorner layer does not display anything for MAUI+WinUI #8096
    6.0-sr2
  • Buttons (or clicking) don't seem to work properly in scrollviews #8446
    6.0-sr3
  • Android - Excessive space on the right side of Grid #7221
    6.0-servicing
  • FlexLayout exception #7824
    6.0-servicing
  • [Android]Content view size not changed when changing width and height dynamically #8549
  • publish android,because of use of ZIndex,Crash. #8525
  • BindableLayout.SetItemsSource for Grid and ScrollView #5719
  • ScrollView and window size #7774
  • [ANDROID] ScrollView not increasing in height when its child ListView or CollectionView are getting more items #6959
    6.0-sr3
  • ScrollView not auto resizing #7374
    6.0-sr3
  • ScrollView layout not updating when child IsVisible is updated #7322
    6.0-sr3
  • ScrollView doesn't work properly on Android. #7590
    6.0-sr3
  • Windows Entry with Text (Child of Frame) causes freeze #8529
  • MAC OS running new X509Certificate2() failed with error The PKCS#12 Exportable flag is not supported on this platform. #8547

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some ScrollView rotation issues on iOS #8570
  • Skip SetNeedsLayout if called from LayoutSubViews #8569
  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • WIP: Implement menu separators #8565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-menubar
  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, .NET 7
  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1245.22 to 1.0.1264.42 #8550
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update SGen to add "NET6_0_OR_GREATER" instead of NET5 #8548
    area/architecture, .NET 7

Merged

  • Replace Newtonsoft.Json dependency with System.Text.Json in Resizetizer #8539
    area/single project ☝️
  • Capture UI context when triggering UI actions #8555
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • More Unpackaged Support #8536
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • Call UpdateEmptyView when switching adapters #8522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr3
  • Propagate appearing/disappearing/deactivated #8542
    t/bug, area/lifecycle 🔁
